summary: This is an internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY) congratulating staff on the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell. It highlights the challenging and non-inevitable nature of building the case against her.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email, arrested and described as 'a woman very worthy of criminal prosecution.'

persons.name: Audrey
persons.context: Mentioned as holding a press conference at 12 regarding the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested in the morning. The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York congratulated its team on the accomplishment.

events.title: Press Conference on Maxwell Arrest
events.description: Audrey from the U.S. Attorney's Office held a press conference at 12 regarding the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested on the morning of July 2, 2020.
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USAO SDNY) internally celebrated the arrest as a major, non-inevitable accomplishment.
The email emphasizes the case was built on 'conduct that I'm pretty sure is older than all of our paralegals,' indicating the historical nature of the alleged crimes.
A press conference regarding the arrest was scheduled for 12 PM on July 2, 2020, to be held by Audrey.
